title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
### KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky

Elevate your kitchen experience with the **KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky**. As the **#1 MIXER BRAND IN THE WORLD** according to Euromonitor International Ltd., based on retail sales revenue across all retail channels, this hand mixer is designed to make your culinary adventures seamless and enjoyable.

#### Key Features:
- **5 Speed Settings**: From slow stirring to high-speed whipping, the 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer offers precise control for a variety of tasks. Whether you're mixing nuts, chocolate chips, whipping meringues, or stirring in chunky ingredients, this mixer has the right speed for the job.
- **Lockable Swivel Cord**: The lockable swivel cord ensures easy movement and prevents tangling, making it a breeze to use and store.
- **One-Button Accessory Removal**: Quickly and easily switch between tasks with the single-handed press button for accessory removal. The included **Stainless Steel Turbo Beater Accessories** are not only durable but also dishwasher-safe, saving you time and effort in cleanup.
- **Compact and Lightweight Design**: Perfect for any kitchen, this hand mixer is both compact and lightweight, allowing for comfortable use and easy storage.

#### What You Can Do:
- **Mix Cookie Dough**: Achieve the perfect consistency every time.
- **Mash Potatoes**: Get smooth and creamy mashed potatoes with ease.
- **Whip Egg Whites and Heavy Cream**: Create fluffy meringues and whipped cream for your desserts.
- **Stir in Chunky Ingredients**: Slowly stir in nuts, chocolate chips, and other mix-ins without overmixing.

#### Why Choose KitchenAid?
- **Trusted Quality**: KitchenAid has been a trusted name in kitchen appliances for generations, known for its reliability and performance.
- **Stylish and Functional**: The Aqua Sky color adds a touch of elegance to your kitchen, making this hand mixer as beautiful as it is functional.
- **Versatile**: Suitable for a wide range of cooking and baking tasks, this mixer is a versatile tool that will become a staple in your kitchen.

#### Verified Excellence:
For more information on KitchenAid's #1 ranking, visit [mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com](http://mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com).

### Transform Your Cooking Experience
The **KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky** is more than just a kitchen tool; it's a partner in your culinary journey. Experience the power, precision, and elegance of KitchenAid today!
